articles.description: BHPian DImPo recently shared this with other enthusiasts. I took delivery of my Grand Vitara Zeta AT on 13/10/22. The Odometer was showing 50 KM. Filled fuel up to auto cut-off and parked at home. Had to go on an office trip and returned a couple of days back.
articles.content:
BHPian DImPo recently shared this with other enthusiasts.
I took delivery of my Grand Vitara Zeta AT on 13/10/22. The Odometer was showing 50 KM. Filled fuel up to auto cut-off and parked at home.

articles.title: Explore the Top 10 Busiest Airports in the World - India.com
articles.description: Delhi's Indira Gandhi International (IGI) Airport emerged as the world's 10th busiest airport in October, improving its ranking compared to the pre-pandemic period. In its report, aviation analytics firm OAG said Delhi airport has improved its position from 1…
articles.content: Image credit: TwitterDubai International Airport ranks second. Earlier this year in March, Delhi's Indira Gandhi International Airport, had emerged as the second busiest airport in the world.

articles.author: Nikhil Agarwal
articles.title: Sinking ship? FIIs sold up to 33% of their holding in these 5 IT stocks - Economic Times
articles.description: In the last five quarters alone, FIIs have pared their ownership by up to one-third in India's top five IT stocks - TCS, Infosys, Wipro, HCL Tech and Tech Mahindra.
articles.content: Though not as fast as rats abandoning a sinking ship, foreign institutional investors or FIIs have been steadily pulling out money from stocks of Indian IT companies amid Wall Street's disdain for te… [+2655 chars]

articles.title: Meet the 3 young Indians whose probing landed Google with a Rs 1,338 cr anti-trust fine - ThePrint
articles.description: Probe against Google began in 2019, based on information submitted to Competition Commission of India by then research associates Umar Javeed & Sukarma Thapar & law student Aaqib Javeed.
articles.content: New Delhi: Google has attracted its largest fine, Rs 1,338 crore, from the Competition Commission of India (CCI) for violating the Competition Act on 20 October. The fine was leveled for abusing its … [+6242 chars]
